text:
With respect to Dr. Bright, facts matter. The Trump Administration has taken strong action to fight this virus:

‣ More than 10 million tests conducted
‣ FDA overseeing trials of 140 potential drugs
‣ On track to develop a vaccine faster than ever in the history of any virus
